sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.* FROM ZC_EM_EXPERT_PRO_BILL B WHERE 1=1
B.EM_BILL_CODE = #zcText0#
exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=B.process_inst_id) or B.process_inst_id = -1
exists (select instance_id from v_wf_current_task_gk53 where executor =#executor# and instance_id = B.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = B.process_inst_id) and B.EM_BILL_STATUS!='cancel' and B.EM_BILL_STATUS!='exec'
B.EM_BILL_STATUS = 'SELECT_WAITING'
B.EM_BILL_STATUS = 'SELECT_PAUSE'
B.EM_BILL_STATUS = 'SELECT_FINISH'
ORDER BY EM_INPUT_DATE DESC

SELECT B.* FROM ZC_EM_EXPERT_PRO_BILL B
B.EM_MAKE_CODE = #zcText0#
ORDER BY B.EM_INPUT_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM ZC_EM_EXPERT_PRO_BILL B WHERE B.EM_BILL_CODE = #EM_BILL_CODE#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ZC_EM_EXPERT_PRO_BILL B AND B.EM_BILL_CODE = #EM_BILL_CODE#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_EM_EXPERT_PRO_BILL( EM_BILL_CODE, EM_MAKE_CODE, EM_TENDERS_TIME, EM_CONTACT_COMPANY, EM_CONTACT_PERSON, EM_CONTACT_PHONE, EM_TECH_MAJOR, EM_TECH_NUM, EM_ECONOMY_MAJOR, EM_ECONOMY_NUM, EM_LEGAL_MAJOR, EM_LEGAL_NUM, EM_AVOID_COMPANY, EM_AVOID_EXPERT, EM_XMDIYU_DAIMA, EM_DIYU_DAIMA, EM_APPROVE_CODE, EM_FS, EM_WJ_CODE, EM_ZJDW, EM_HWMC, EM_BZ, EM_CHOUQ_NUM, EM_BILL_STATUS, EM_INPUT_CODE, EM_INPUT_DATE, EM_CO_CODE, EM_MAKE_NAME, EM_ZJDW_CODE, EM_ZJDW_NAME, EM_TOTAL_NUM, EM_GUARDER_CODE, PROCESS_INST_ID, EM_BILL_PLACE, EM_BILL_PRINCIPAL, EM_BILL_AMOUNT, EM_EXPERT_BILL_TYPE, EM_ESTIMATE_TIME, EM_CALL_INFO, EM_MSG_INFO ) values ( #billCode:VARCHAR#, #makeCode:VARCHAR#, #tendersTime:TIMESTAMP#, #contactCompany:VARCHAR#, #contactPerson:VARCHAR#, #contactPhone:VARCHAR#, #techMajor:VARCHAR#, #techNum:DECIMAL#, #ecoMajor:VARCHAR#, #ecoNum:DECIMAL#, #legalMajor:VARCHAR#, #legalNum:DECIMAL#, #avoidCompany:VARCHAR#, #avoidExpert:VARCHAR#, #xmDiyuCode:VARCHAR#, #diyuCode:VARCHAR#, #approveCode:VARCHAR#, #emFs:VARCHAR#, #wjCode:VARCHAR#, #zjdw:VARCHAR#, #hwmc:VARCHAR#, #emBz:VARCHAR#, #chouqNum:DECIMAL#, #billStatus:VARCHAR#, #inputorId:VARCHAR#, #inputorDate:TIMESTAMP#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #makeName:VARCHAR#, #zjdw:VARCHAR#, #zjdwName:VARCHAR#, #totalNum:DECIMAL#, #guarderCode:VARCHAR#, #processInstId:DECIMAL#, #billPlace:VARCHAR#, #billPrincipal:VARCHAR#, #billAmount:DECIMAL#, #expertBillType:VARCHAR#, #estimateTime:DECIMAL#, #callInfo:VARCHAR#, #msgInfo:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EM_EXPERT_PRO_BILL set EM_MAKE_CODE = #makeCode:VARCHAR#, EM_TENDERS_TIME = #tendersTime:TIMESTAMP#, EM_CONTACT_COMPANY = #contactCompany:VARCHAR#, EM_CONTACT_PERSON = #contactPerson:VARCHAR#, EM_CONTACT_PHONE = #contactPhone:VARCHAR#, EM_TECH_MAJOR = #techMajor:VARCHAR#, EM_TECH_NUM = #techNum:DECIMAL#, EM_ECONOMY_MAJOR = #ecoMajor:VARCHAR#, EM_ECONOMY_NUM = #ecoNum:DECIMAL#, EM_LEGAL_MAJOR = #legalMajor:VARCHAR#, EM_LEGAL_NUM = #legalNum:DECIMAL#, EM_AVOID_COMPANY = #avoidCompany:VARCHAR#, EM_AVOID_EXPERT = #avoidExpert:VARCHAR#, EM_XMDIYU_DAIMA = #xmDiyuCode:VARCHAR#, EM_DIYU_DAIMA = #diyuCode:VARCHAR#, EM_APPROVE_CODE = #approveCode:VARCHAR#, EM_FS = #emFs:VARCHAR#, EM_WJ_CODE = #wjCode:VARCHAR#, EM_ZJDW = #zjdw:VARCHAR#, EM_HWMC = #hwmc:VARCHAR#, EM_BZ = #emBz:VARCHAR#, EM_CHOUQ_NUM = #chouqNum:DECIMAL#, EM_BILL_STATUS = #billStatus:VARCHAR#, EM_INPUT_CODE = #inputorId:VARCHAR#, EM_INPUT_DATE = #inputorDate:TIMESTAMP#, EM_CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#, EM_MAKE_NAME = #makeName:VARCHAR#, EM_ZJDW_CODE = #zjdw:VARCHAR#, EM_ZJDW_NAME = #zjdwName:VARCHAR#, EM_TOTAL_NUM = #totalNum:DECIMAL#, EM_GUARDER_CODE = #guarderCode:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:DECIMAL#, EM_BILL_PLACE = #billPlace:VARCHAR#, EM_BILL_PRINCIPAL = #billPrincipal:VARCHAR#, EM_BILL_AMOUNT = #billAmount:DECIMAL#, EM_EXPERT_BILL_TYPE = #expertBillType:VARCHAR#, EM_ESTIMATE_TIME = #estimateTime:DECIMAL#, EM_CALL_INFO = #callInfo:VARCHAR#, EM_MSG_INFO = #msgInfo:VARCHAR# where EM_BILL_CODE = #billCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM EM_BILL_SERVER_LIST B WHERE B.EM_BILL_CODE = #EM_BILL_CODE#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE EM_BILL_SERVER_LIST B SET EM_STATUS = #EM_STATUS# WHERE B.EM_BILL_CODE = #EM_BILL_CODE#
UPDATE ZC_EM_EXPERT_PRO_BILL SET EM_BILL_STATUS = #EM_STATUS# WHERE EM_BILL_CODE = #EM_BILL_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM V_ZC_PRO_MAKE_EXPERT ORDER BY ZC_INPUT_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM ZC_V_PRO_PACK WHERE ZC_MAKE_CODE = #PROJ_CODE# ORDER BY PACK_CODE

SELECT b.em_bill_code, b.em_make_name, p.* FROM ZC_V_PRO_PACK p, zc_em_expert_evaluation e, zc_em_expert_pro_bill_pack ep, ZC_EM_EXPERT_PRO_BILL b where p.proj_code = ep.proj_code and ep.em_bill_code = e.em_bill_code and ep.em_bill_code = b.em_bill_code and e.em_expert_code = #value#
